rules_text:
Colossal 2–{5}{G}{U} [i](You may cast this for its colossal cost to have it enter with two +1/+1 counters; or pay {5}{G}{U} as a sorcery: Put two +1/+1 counters on it if it has none.)[/i]
Flying
Each creature you control with a counter on it has vigilance and “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
